com.decoded.zool

Class Zool

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.decoded.zool.Zool

  • public class Zool
extends java.lang.Object
    Zool is a Zookeeper Interface Client for Microservice Configuration and Coordination Zool can act as both the announcer hub, or the client zookeeperHost which announces itself among the other hosts on the network.
